title: Manager- Clinical Research and Pharmacovigilance

ambitionBoxData.Title: Bharat Serums and Vaccines Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


(1)Ensuring management of trials are done in compliance with ICH, GCP, BSV standards, local laws and regulations.

(2)Providing guidance and oversight to CROs.

(3)Ensuring clinical trials are effectively executed and completed within budget, timelines and meeting enrolment commitments. Pro-active trial management to identify challenges, develop effective mitigation plans and to appropriately escalate and inform all relevant parties.

(4)Oversee drug and clinical supplies management to ensure sites have timely availability of required materials to avoid disruption of protocol deliverables and to oversee appropriate final disposition of IMP.

(5) Ensuring clinical study site close-out in accordance with local regulations and ensure dissemination of clinical trial results to the participating study investigators. Oversee appropriate file archiving of all relevant study materials in accordance with local laws and guidelines.

title: Social Media / Website Content Executive
tagsAndSkills: Web Content Writing,Digital Marketing,Social Media Marketing,Social Media Management,Content Writing,Content Creation,PR,Blogging
jobDescription:
Job Overview

As a Social Media & Website Content Executive, you will be responsible for managing the social media strategy and overseeing the content on the companys website. This role requires a blend of creative and technical skills to ensure that all content is engaging, aligned with the brand, and optimized for search engines. You will play a crucial role in building the brand’s online presence, increasing engagement, driving traffic, and ensuring the website content is relevant, up-to-date, and user-friendly.

Key Responsibility Areas

Social Media Management

  • Content Creation & Curation: Expert Level
  • Develop engaging and high-quality content (text, images, videos) for social media platforms that align with the brand’s voice.
  • Create image compositions and customised images and Templates using graphic design software. (Photoshop + Illustrator or Canva)
  • Curate relevant content from trusted sources to share across social media channels.
  • Produce visually appealing and compelling social media assets.
  • Social Media Platform Management: Expert Level
  • Manage and maintain social media profiles on platforms such as LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram.
  • Schedule and publish posts consistently, following platform-specific best practices.
  • Monitor social media trends, conversations, and industry news to inform content creation and engagement strategies.
  • Set up, launch, and manage paid advertising campaigns across multiple social media platforms.
  • Community Engagement: Expert Level
  • Engage with followers by responding to comments, messages, and mentions promptly.
  • Identify and collaborate with influencers and brand advocates to expand the brand’s reach.
  • Performance Analysis: Expert Level
  • Track and analyze social media performance using analytics tools to measure engagement, reach, and follower growth.
  • Report on social media metrics and provide insights for optimizing future campaigns.
  • Adjust strategies based on performance data to improve results.

Website Content Expertise

  • Content Development & Updates: Expert Level
  • Create, edit, and update website content, ensuring it aligns with the brand’s messaging and appeals to the target audience.
  • Work closely with various departments to gather content requirements and ensure timely updates across all website sections, including blogs, product pages, and news articles.
  • Ensure all website content is consistent in tone, style, and quality, providing a seamless user experience.
  • SEO Optimization: Basic Level
  • Optimize website content for search engines, incorporating relevant keywords, meta tags, and SEO best practices.
  • Collaborate with internal teams to improve the website’s visibility and organic search rankings.
  • Continuously monitor and adjust website content to enhance SEO performance and user engagement.
  • Content Strategy & Planning: Basic Level
  • Develop and execute a content strategy for the website that aligns with overall marketing goals and enhances the user journey.
  • Identify opportunities for new content creation based on user behaviour, industry trends, and competitive analysis.
  • Coordinate with the digital marketing team to ensure website content supports and integrates with other marketing activities, such as email campaigns and social media promotions.
  • Content Management System (CMS) Expertise: Basic Level
  • Manage and update website content using the company’s CMS (e.g., WordPress, Drupal, Joomla), ensuring all updates are accurate and visually appealing.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to content uploads, formatting, or CMS functionality.
  • Provide training and support to team members on CMS best practices, if needed.
  • User Experience (UX) & User Interface (UI) Enhancement: Basic Level
  • Collaborate with the web development and design teams to ensure content is presented in an aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly manner.
  • Work on improving the website’s navigation and layout to enhance user experience and ensure easy access to information.
  • Gather user feedback to identify areas for improvement and implement changes to optimize the overall website experience.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree
  • Minimum work experience 2 years and / or upto 5 years
  • Proven and documented skills in managing social media accounts and website content for a brand or organization / agency preferably IT or Tech industry.
  • Certifications if any are an added advantage

Compulsory Skills

  • Strong understanding and expert skills in management of social media platforms, trends, and analytics tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Sprout Social, Google Analytics).
  • Knowledge of any graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Canva)
  • Experience with paid social media advertising (Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads).
  • Experience with content management systems (CMS) like WordPress, Drupal, or Joomla.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a strong ability to create engaging content for both social media and websites.
  • Knowledge of SEO best practices and tools for optimizing website content.
  • Creative mindset with a keen eye for design and detail-oriented approach to content management.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Familiarity with UX/UI principles and how they apply to website content presentation.
  • Understanding of email marketing platforms and their integration with website content.

Working Conditions

  • Full-time position.
  • Office-based with some flexibility for remote work subject to manager approval.
  • Occasional evening or weekend work may be required during campaign launches or events.

Benefits: Health insurance, Accidental insurance, PF, Reimbursable expenses

title: Estate Manager
tagsAndSkills: Property Management,Estate Management,Land Acquisition,Site Acquisition,Commercial Leasing,Property,Management,Site
jobDescription:
• Take care of all the estates and properties of the company.
  • Ready to travel Pan India to execute the estate related transactions.
  • Should be able to do buying, selling and leasing of the properties.
  • Should be able to handle and execute small scale infrastructure projects like office repairs and renovations in co-ordination with Architects, contractors and other stakeholders.
  • Will be responsible for maintenance of all the office in Mumbai.
  • Will be responsible for attending to snags in all the offices.
  • Should be able to do snagging and de-snagging of prospective properties for the company.
  • Should have strong network of brokers and real estate advisors Pan India.
  • Should be able to co-ordinate with other departments like legal, accounts etc. to carry out the work effectively.
  • Should be well verse with basic land documents and legal due diligence for estate.
  • Should be able to handle an adverse situation at any estate.
  • Should have experience in working under tight timelines and able deliver under pressure.
  • Should have experience in handling office and home interior projects.
  • Should be proficient in oral and written communication.

Should have sound knowledge of MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint Role & responsibilities
